reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be of high quality, with one noting it feels like a $150 boutique dress, and appreciate its comfort and flattering fit that hides the stomach nicely. The dress is versatile, working well for garden weddings and beach photos, and one customer mentions it has plenty of chest room for larger busts. While many customers like the length, some find it runs long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars i want it in every color!
items.body: BEAUTIFUL!!! i am 6’2 and this dress fit wonderfully. i would say it was true to size. it has a long underskirt so no need to worry about it being see through. the quality of fabric was spectacular. i bought it again in a different color! very comfortable you can wear a strapless bra under it or nothing at all. straps are adjustable too. Read more
items.author: Ryan Bateman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress!!
items.body: This dress is amazing. The quality is SO good! That material thick and the back has the stretchy band! I’m a 36 DDD, around 175, and 5’7. The length is absolutely perfect on me so definitely made for tall girls. So easy to wear for all occasions and even to throw a cardigan or jean jacket on top! Great staple piece for your closet! Get the boutique look without the boutique price! Read more
items.author: Mckayla Brinkley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty on my daughter
items.body: Loved this for senior pictures, vibrant blue. Great fit, quality material Read more
items.author: Elizabeth

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality
items.body: This dress is so cute!! I am 5’5” and ordered an XL and the length hit me just at the ankle and was cute with a low heel. The fabric was so good and felt high quality, the dress is lined and definitely not see-through. It is not fitted so will hide a tummy and shapewear may not be necessary. The only issue I had is the straps on the top didn’t feel very secure (although adjustable!) because they are skinny. If you are large chested, it will fit and give coverage but just didn’t feel like I could move around without the straps breaking. I ultimately returned it, and was sad as the rest of the dress was such great quality! I ordered an XL and normally wear XL/XXL or size 18 depending on brand and it fit me perfectly. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful long maxi dress
items.body: LOVE this maxi dress. It was the perfect fit for me and was great for beach photos. The material was good quality! I had to iron it as it got wrinkly but was fine once I put it on. Would recommend to others! Read more
items.author: Jayna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So flattering
items.body: Great quality! I’ve gotten so many compliments on this dress! Very comfortable! Material is thick, but not too heavy. Cuts nice to show my figure! Read more
items.author: Erika Higgins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, great material!
items.body: So cute! The white is a good thick material so it isn’t see through. Fits true to size. Blue color accent is so cute! Wrinkles will fall if you hang it for a bit as the fabric is heavy enough. Read more
items.author: Greg T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and well made dress
items.body: Beautiful and nice quality. Excited to wear in Mexico for an upcoming trip! Read more
items.author: Jennifer K.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rust, Dark Pink, Aqua Green, Sage Green, Black, Dark Red, Dark Green, Light Blue, Wine Red, Pink, White, Beige, Royal Blue, Dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
